name: MTKTextureLoader.Origin
desc: Options for specifying when to flip the pixel coordinates of the texture.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a texture origin option from a raw string value.

items.name: static let topLeft: MTKTextureLoader.Origin
items.desc: An option for specifying images that should be flipped only to put their origin in the top-left corner.

items.name: static let bottomLeft: MTKTextureLoader.Origin
items.desc: An option for specifying images that should be flipped only to put their origin in the bottom-left corner.

items.name: static let flippedVertically: MTKTextureLoader.Origin
items.desc: An option that specifies that images should always be flipped.
